post:
bodHOST is offering Shared Hosting plans in order to give start-ups an opportunity to experience top notch web hosting services within their budget. Don't let any other customer grab this deal before you do. Find the most suitable plan for yourself below & get going.

bodHOST has now started with application development and design, CMS customization services and database administration services that you may need while setting up your shared server.
